data.name: Yuan Dynasty â€” Cobalt-Blue Cup with Single Handle
data.description: This cup has a funnel-shaped form with a metal rim at the mouth. The slanted body features a ring-shaped handle on one side. The base is carved into a recessed foot, left unglazed and coated with a yellowish-brown slip for protection. Except for the base, the entire surface is covered in a cobalt-blue glaze. Traces of once-present gold or silver foil decoration can still be faintly seen on the glaze. Below the inner rim is a band of lozenge-patterned squares, while the center of the interior displays a twelve-pointed star rosette. A single branch of plum blossoms encircles the exterior wall.

medias.name: work_image_main
medias.alt_text: Yuan Dynasty Cobalt-Blue Single-Handled Cup: A deep-blue, funnel-shaped cup with a slightly flared rim edged in metal. One side features a small rectangular loop handle. The glaze is smooth and richly colored.

Traces of once-present gold or silver foil decoration can still be faintly seen on the glaze. Below the inner rim is a band of lozenge-patterned squares, while the center of the interior displays a twelve-pointed star rosette. A single branch of plum blossoms encircles the exterior wall.
